projects.publicName: ReShare - to borrow and lend items
projects.description: A project designed and build during Technigo's upskill course in javaScript and React. The ReShare is a mission aligned with Agenda 2030 - Addressing siciatal challanges through innovative solutions.It was a collaborative front end project which was completed in three weeks and we applied all the knowledge we learned during the course. designed and built a fullstack app in three weeks, applying everything we had learned during the course. We followed an agile process, collaborated on GitHub, and regularly demoed our progress.

Developed as part of a team project with the goal of learning React and Redux. The application allows users to create and manage goal-oriented projects with nested tasks, as well as standalone individual tasks. Focus was on state management, task hierarchy, and user-friendly interaction.

A fun and educational quiz game built with React and Redux, designed to test usersâ€™ knowledge about Sweden. Players earn 2 points for correct answers and lose 1 point for wrong or unanswered ones. Features include a countdown timer, real-time feedback, and a final score summary. The app emphasizes clean UI and responsive user experience.

Utilizing themoviedb.org's API to showcase movies and their details. Features include fetching popular movies, rendering movie details, and managing image URLs. Designed with a focus on responsiveness and accessibility. Enhancements include error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists.
A React frontend project focused on state management and API interactions for fetching and posting data in a feed.
